actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution expressing the appreciation of the Senate for the distinguished humanitarian service of Jean-Pierre Hocke as United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees and with the International Committee of the Red Cross.

summary.text: Expresses the gratitude of the Senate for the distinguished humanitarian service that Jean-Pierre Hocke, former United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees and Director of Operations for the International Committee of the Red Cross, and his colleagues have rendered on behalf of refugees, political prisoners, and prisoners of war throughout the world.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the appreciation of the Senate for the distinguished humanitarian service of Jean-Pierre Hocke as United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees and with the International Committee of the Red Cross.
